page.title: 09S.W.GUILDFORD:CHURCH LIFE
page.content: The Guildford area contains churches of several denominations : Anglican (high and low), United Reformed, Baptist and Christadelphian. The churches are Holy Trinity, Saint Mary's, Saint Saviour's, All Saints, Saint Nicholas, Millmead Centre and a United Reformed Church. The area enjoys an active religious life, which is indicated by the increasing size of congregations. The largest are at Saint Saviour's and Millmead, with 500 to 600 regular participants. Evangelistic activities centre on the busy High Street. Each church holds creches, Sunday Schools and youth groups. These youth groups, such as "Wayfarers" at Saint Saviour's, provide the opportunity for religious instruction and socialising.
